alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 8:32PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of DC and central Maryland, including the following counties: in DC, District of Columbia. In central Maryland, Anne Arundel and Prince Georges. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 832 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowie... Severn... Annapolis... College Park... Crofton... Greenbelt... Langley Park... Beltsville... Bladensburg... Mayo... Shady Side... Naval Academy... Baltimore-Washington Airport... Rhode River... South River... Severn River... University of Maryland... Fort Totten... Glen Burnie... Severna Park... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
